function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement strict measures in high-risk zones, such as increased sanitation and enforcement of social distancing.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct targeted testing in diverse environments and communities to account for specific risk factors and transmission patterns.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement clear guidelines and regulations for the ethical use of the technology, with a focus on data anonymization and consent-based tracking.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, conduct regular privacy impact assessments, and obtain informed consent from individuals","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough testing and validation of ai algorithms, human oversight and intervention, and continuous monitoring for algorithm biases","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement double-entry verification for data input","category":"Raising actividades grupales virtuales, acceso a servicios de salud mental y asesoría profesional.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proveer formación en ergonomía, promover pausas activas y establecer pautas para la organización del espacio de trabajo.","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementar protocolos de salud y seguridad para el trabajo remoto, promover la vacunación y concienciar sobre hábitos saludables.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote
